alert.note: Alert for Benton; Morgan; St. Clair (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 8:10PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT BENTON...ST. CLAIR AND NORTHWESTERN MORGAN COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM CDT... At 810 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Smithton to near Warsaw to near Schell City. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Truman State Park, Truman Lake, Warsaw, Lincoln, Appleton City, Cole Camp, Stover, Osceola, Lowry City, Syracuse, Roscoe, Ionia, Vista, Palo Pinto, Lakeview Heights, Florence, Crockerville, Racket, Mora and Johnson City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and west central Missouri.
